org.vanilladb.core.query.algebra

Interface Scan

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Record
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    UpdateScan
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChunkScan, ExplainScan, GroupByScan, HashJoinScan, IndexJoinScan, IndexSelectScan, MergeJoinScan, MultiBufferProductScan, ProductScan, ProjectScan, SelectScan, SortScan, TableScan

    public interface Scan
extends Record
    The interface will be implemented by each query scan. There is a Scan class for each relational algebra operator.

    The beforeFirst() method must be called before next().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beforeFirst()
      Positions the scan before its first record.
      void close()
      Closes the scan and its subscans, if any.
      boolean hasField(String fldName)
      Returns true if the scan has the specified field.
      boolean next()
      Moves the scan to the next record.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.vanilladb.core.sql.Record

        getVal

    • Method Detail

      • beforeFirst

        void beforeFirst()
        Positions the scan before its first record.

      • next

        boolean next()
        Moves the scan to the next record.
        Returns:
        false if there is no next record

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the scan and its subscans, if any.

      • hasField

        boolean hasField(String fldName)
        Returns true if the scan has the specified field.
        Parameters:
        fldName - the name of the field
        Returns:
        true if the scan has that field
